/usr/bin/cc   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/glfwinfo.c.o CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/__/deps/getopt.c.o CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/__/deps/glad_gl.c.o CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/__/deps/glad_vulkan.c.o  -o glfwinfo  -Wl,-rpath,/home/krusto/CLionProjects/BlockCraft/vendor/glad/glfw-3.3.4/src ../src/libglfw.so.3.3 -lm
